name: Wild Mushrooms a la Russe (Wild mushrooms in sour cream)
keywords: appetizer, side dish, fall, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, sour cream, wild mushrooms
recipeIngredient: 1 pound wild mushrooms such as pleurotes, cepes, porcini, shiitake or Black Forest, cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in skillet and add mushrooms, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, until mushrooms give up liquid. Continue cooking until liquid evaporates. Total cooking time is about 6 minutes.
Add chives, dill, parsley and sour cream. Blend and bring barely to boil. Do not boil or sauce will curdle. Add salt and pepper and serve.
